before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ptvi","text":"Ensure all incubators and ovens are at the appropriate temperature prior to experiment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1323r","text":"We have developed a multiplexed single molecule FISH protocol for use at the Institute. This protocol was optimized on human tissue, but will work on mouse tissue as well. It was adapted from Lyubimova et. al., Nature Protocols, 2013. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer:

groups.title: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"ak0o8","text":"Ensure that all reagents are in recombinant and RNAse-free format, as we have noticed RNA degradation in solutions that contain enzymes derived from whole organisms. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"duv30","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1sjc7","text":"We filter every solution with a 0.2um syringe filter prior to use. This reduces background spots and dust that interfere with imaging of diffraction limited spots. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6lilm","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fs8qa","text":"For the SDS treatment after fixation and permeabilization, be gentle when dropping SDS onto the section, as well as during washes. This treatment is relatively harsh and the tissue must be treated somewhat delicately. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5rf8r","text":"10-14 um cryosections are taken from fresh-frozen tissue, which are collected on poly-lysine-treated #1 coverslips at room temperature (RT). After 5-10 min at RT, sections are placed at 4°C until sectioning is complete. At that point, proceed immediately to fixation and permeabilization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3miru","text":"Air dry for 30 min in fume hood (Stopping point: store coverslips at -80C)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"478l3","text":"Optional: Treat sections with 8% SDS/PBS for 10 minutes, followed by 3 – 5 rinses with PBSor 2XSSC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e0j8o","text":"Place sections in hyb  buffer without probes for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2r0b1","text":"Add probes to  400ul hyb buffer at a final concentration of 2ng/ul* (specific to 6-well plate format – if using perfusion chamber, this volume can be reduced)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"feu44","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1jkqm","text":"*We store a working 200ng/ul stock of probes in the dark at 4C. These are diluted 1:100 for hybridizations, but this may need to be adjusted depending on the probe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"623kg","text":"Add 2 ml wash buffer to each well, incubate at 37 C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"15gr7","text":"Add 2 ml fresh wash buffer and incubate at 37 C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3r3ih","text":"Replace wash buffer with fresh wash buffer + DAPI (final 5ug/mL) and incubate at 37 C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"orv5","text":"Mount and image or store at 4 C in 2XSSC until imaging session","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7ijkn","text":"Add enzymes to Imaging Buffer just prior to imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Sequential smFISH Allen Institute
